IFGC.name: IFGC
IFGC.desc: The main hub of all things IFGC, if you're not sure where to join first, this is the place!

EireDashers.name: Eiredashers
EireDashers.desc: The Irish discord for all airdashers and anime games from Blazblue to Guilty Gear

SmashIreland.name: Smash Ireland
SmashIreland.desc: The centre of all things Smash related in Ireland, from Melee to Ultimate

TekkenIreland.name: Tekken Ireland
TekkenIreland.desc: One of Ireland's strongest games thanks to a dedicated grassroots effort

DBFZIreland.name: DBFZ Ireland
DBFZIreland.desc: A growing group of players dedicated to DBFZ, running regular online events

IrishMK.name: Irish MK
IrishMK.desc: Love Mortal Kombat? We've got an insanely strong scene!

SSBMIreland.name: SSBM Ireland
SSBMIreland.desc: Interested in playing Melee in Ireland? This is the place to be!

StreetFighterIreland.name: SF Ireland
StreetFighterIreland.desc: Ireland's dedicated SF server, for discussion of SF 2 to 6 and everything inbetween

Cork.name: Leeside Collision
Cork.desc: Cork's dedicated discord for its local FGC. They play a variety of games!

Dublin.name: Dublin FGC
Dublin.desc: There isn't really a Dublin specific discord so most Dublin players use the IFGC one

TNA.name: The North Awakens
TNA.desc: The main discord of Smash in N.Ireland! Join for info on all events happening in the North!

DAC.name: DAC
DAC.desc: An active Dublin Smash scene running regular events

Rebel's Guard.name: Rebel's Guard
Rebel's Guard.desc: The Munster Smash scene, events running mostly in Cork & Kerry

ButtonMash.name: Button Mash
ButtonMash.desc: Primarily running FGC events in Belfast often alongside Big Fish (Smash events)

Level1.name: Level 1
Level1.desc: Running a yearly national tournament in Dublin, featuring games from all communities
